sentence: Why was the boy having trouble finding power in the cul-de-sac? there was no outlet
explanation: an outlet is a point in the electrical system where current is drawn
first_new_sentence: I need to plug my phone into the nearest electrical outlet to charge it.
second_new_sentence: During the meeting, I shared my thoughts while others were busy looking for an outlet to vent their frustrations.

sentence: What do you call a dinosaur who just got out of a relationship? tyrannosaurus ex
explanation: refers to a former partner or spouse
first_new_sentence: My ex was always supportive during our relationship.
second_new_sentence: The dinosaur family had many fossils, and the tyrannosaurus ex was one of the most famous among them.

sentence: What is the clumsiest bee? a bumbling bee
first_new_sentence: The bee was buzzing around the garden collecting nectar from flowers.
second_new_sentence: The production of honey by a bee depends on the time of year and the availability of blooming plants.

sentence: What do you call a bear in the rain? a drizzly bear
first_new_sentence: The bear caught a fish in the river and enjoyed a hearty meal.
second_new_sentence: I couldnt bear the thought of leaving my job without giving proper notice.
